description:
Saki Hyuga, who works at her family’s bakery, runs into Mai Mishou, who became a graphic designer. They spend a merry evening with Nozomi and the others, who are overjoyed that they have all gotten back together again. However, Saki never gets the chance to find out from Mai what has been bothering her. So, a few days later, Saki gets Mai to help her out with the bakery’s bread truck.
Source: crunchyroll
